pages.text: $(c)$(l)Impetus Mushroom Stew $()is a spicy, ruby-colored mushroom stew made with $(c)$(l)Impetus Mushrooms$(). Upon consumption, it'll grant the user a few seconds of $(4)$(l)Strength$().
$(3)$(l)Clypeus Mushroom Stew $()is a refreshing, teal-colored mushroom stew made with $(3)$(l)Clypeus Mushrooms$(). Upon consumption, it'll grant the user a few seconds of $(7)$(l)Resistance$().
$(d)$(l)Utilis Mushroom Stew $()is a umami, rose-colored mushroom stew made with $(d)$(l)Utilis Mushrooms$(). Upon consumption, it'll grant the user a few seconds of $(6)$(l)Haste$().
$(a)$(l)Vivifica Mushroom Stew $()is a sweet, lime-colored mushroom stew made with $(a)$(l)Vivifica Mushrooms$(). Upon consumption, it'll grant the user a few seconds of $(c)$(l)Regeneration$().
